site_name: Portal West6 Portal WayLondon W3 6RU
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (s73) to vary condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission ref: 161144FUL dated 14/02/2017 for: Demolition of all existing buildings and the redevelopment of the site to provide a double storey basement with four buildings of 2, 9, 11, 32 and 42 storeys comprising 578 residential flats (Use class C3)(mix of 1 bed, 2 bed and 3 bed flats) and 3179sqm (GIA) of flexible use class A1 and/or A2 and/or A3 and/or A4 and/or B1 and/or D1 and/or D2 floorspace, landscaped east-to-west public route between Victoria Road and Portal Way, together with associated amenity and play space, roof gardens, cycle parking, car parking, servicing, public realm improvements, landscaping and infrastructure works. (Full Planning Application accompanied by an nvironmental Impact Assessment). Variation seeks to allow to reduce the typical floor-to-floor heights across all 4 blocks; alterations tothe upper floor design of Blocks A and C to allow for two additional floors within the consented height envelope of these blocks esulting in an additional 26 flats - 14 in Block A and 12 in Block C (comprising 19 x 1 bed and 7 x 2 bed), 10% of which would be wheelchair adaptable; an increase in the size of one of the flats on the first floor of Block B from a 1-bed flat to a 3-bed flat; minor internal layout changes to accommodate detailed design development of the structure and services; and alterations to the cycle parking
